challenge.title: Gabriel Kuhn - Sober Living for the Revolution
challenge.description: Gabriel Kuhn's Sober Living for the Revolution explores the radical culture of straight edge and sober living.
challenge.instructions: Use Archive.org E-Reserves to read Gabriel Kuhn's Sober Living for the Revolution.
